title: Resolution problem!
body:
Now guys I need help!! I changed my resolution too high in a game and I canÂ´t see my screen anymore if I try to play! Is there any kind of way I can change my resolution back to normal??? ;-;
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
No worries!  You should be able to restore your resolution to default through resetting your config.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
